<p>Art is the former Chairman, CEO and President of OppenheimerFunds. After joining the firm in 1986, Art held a number of positions over his 33-year tenure, including analyst, portfolio manager and Chief Investment Officer. Art was named President in 2013, CEO in 2014, and in 2015, his role was further expanded to include Chairman of the firm with $250 billion under management.  He <a href="https://www.institutionalinvestor.com/article/b1d1qnc2nrdp9l/OppenheimerFunds-CEO-to-Leave-After-Invesco-Acquisition">stepped down</a> when the firm was folded into Invesco.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->
